Class Game

java.lang.Object
Model.Game
public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
This class contains the game itself

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game​(java.lang.String userName, int level)
      Creates the stage, scene and adds items to it
      Parameters:
      userName - Name of the user which is entered right before the game
      level - Game level

  • Method Details

    • deleteScores

      public void deleteScores​(java.lang.String filepath)
      Deletes the round scores in the given filepath
      Parameters:
      filepath - the location of the round score files

    • createTimer

      public void createTimer​(java.lang.String userName, javafx.stage.Stage stage, int level)
      Changes the frogs points and stops the game at appropriate times
      Parameters:
      userName - Name of player
      level - Designated level to play on
      stage - Designated stage for game to take place

    • saveScore

      public static void saveScore​(java.lang.String name, int level, int score, java.lang.String filepath)
      Saves the score of the player in a file
      Parameters:
      name - Name of player
      level - Game level
      score - Score of the player in the game
      filepath - The location of the file where the high scores are stored

    • start

      public void start​(java.lang.String userName, javafx.stage.Stage stage, int level)
      Starts up various functions for the beginning of the game
      Parameters:
      userName - Name of Player
      level - Level chosen by player
      stage - Chosen stage in which game stakes place

    • finalStop

      public static void finalStop​(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      Stops the timer function for the end of the game
      Parameters:
      stage - Stage where game is taking place

      Provides the image of the number required for the score
